message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you in the first round.
I'll take $58, you get $42. It's better for you to accept now, the money is losing value for you!
I'm feeling generous, Bob. $55 for me, and $45 for you.  Let's wrap this up before the money shrinks any further!
The money's value is dropping fast for you! I'll take $62, you get $38. Don't wait, or you'll lose even more!
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. Let's split it down the middle - $50 for each of us. It's fair, and we can end this before we both lose out.
You're losing a lot to inflation! I'll take $65, you get $35. This is your last chance before it's almost worthless to you!
